I have to stop Bermud!

52351.「この部屋を出て 右に行った所の扉を開けると\n 闘いの広間に出る エレベーター:
Leave this room and go to the right, and it'll
lead to a room with an elevator. That'll take
you to the Monstrous Pit where Bermud is...

52352.「もしかしたら 命がけになるかもしれない。\n でも 思いだした以上 放っておけ:
I might be risking my life here... but now
that I've remembered, I have to do this.
I gotta go!

52354.「サバイバルデスマッチは 中止よ！\n 魔物は みんな 逃がしてしまったもの！:
The Survival Deathmatch has been canceled!
All the monsters have escaped!

52356.「今すぐ 逃げた魔物を追え！\n 抵抗するようなら 殺しても構わん。:
Don't let any of them escape! If they resist,
kill them.

52358.「あなたは まもの使いの\n ベルムドさんでしょう！？:
You are Bermud, the Monster Master, aren't
you?!

52359.「岩山のレリーフに描かれている\n 偉大な まもの使いって……\n ベルムドさん:
The great Monster Master shown on that
monument is... you, isn't it?

52360.「……私 思いだしたの。\n あなたのことも 自分が何者なのかも。: I remember you... and I remember who I am.

52361.「魔物たちを 深く愛していた あなたが\n どうして 格闘場の魔物たちに\n あ:
How could you, who loved the monsters so much,
treat them so badly...?

52363.「私の かわいい教え子たちを\n 戦争の盾に使って 醜く 生き延びた\n 卑劣で:
They are the vile, sinful bastards who used my
students as war shields while they continued
to live their disgusting lives!

52366.「……ベルムドさん。もう 終わりにしよう？\n そうだとしても あの人たちだって:
Bermud... let's just end this. Haven't they
already suffered enough?

52367.「セラフィッ！\n なぜ お前は 過去を取り戻してなお\n あんな鬼畜どもに 肩:
Seraphi! Why do you still stand by those
bastards even after getting your memory
back?!

52371.「な…なぜ 戻ってきた！？\n まさか セラフィを……？:
W-why have you come back?!
No way... Seraphi's...?

52372.「……いや むしろ 好都合よ！\n あの方から たまわったチカラで\n 今こそ:
...heh! This is quite convenient! With the
power he gave me, I shall now avenge my
students!

52375.「我が復讐を ジャマする者は\n 皆 排除してくれるわ！！:
Anyone who gets in the way of my vengeance
will be eliminated!

52378.「オォォ……我が復讐を ジャマする者は\n 皆 排除してくれよう……。:
Urrrgh... Anyone who gets in the way of my
vengeance will be eliminated...

52380.「やつらを皆殺しにするまで 私は死ねぬ……。: I refuse to die until they are all dead...

52382.「なぜ かばう！？\n あいつらは お前の 仲間たちの命を\n 物のように扱い:
Why are you defending them?! These bastards
treated the lives of your friends like trash
to be thrown away!

52383.「ベルムドさん……。忘れてしまったの？\n あなたが いつも言ってたのよ。:
Have you forgotten...? You always used to tell
me.

52384.「まもの使いに いちばん必要なのは\n どんな凶悪な魔物でも\n 受け入れ 許す:
The most important thing for a Monster Master
is to accept and forgive even the most vicious
of monsters!

52386.「大丈夫か？ ケガはないか！？: Are you okay? Are you hurt?

52390.「そんな……。ベルムドさん。\n なぜ こんなことに……。: No... how could I let this happen...?

52391.「フフッ。私の教え子ではない お前だけが\n ただひとり 過去を取り戻すとはな…:
Heh... you aren't my student, but you're the
only one who could reclaim their memories...

52392.「それもこれも…… ヤツとの絆のおかげか。\n 私は まもの使いにとって 大事な:
It's all thanks to that... bond with him,
isn't it? I seem to have lost what it truly
means to be a Monster Master...

52394.「ベルムド王の正体が 魔物だったとは……。:
I had no idea that the king was actually a
monster...

52395.「王になりすまし 国民を扇動していた魔物は\n 我ら グランゼドーラ兵が討ち取っ:
The monster impersonating the king and
inciting the citizens has been felled by my
soldiers of Gran Zedora!

52396.「これより アラハギーロの民の安全は\n 我がグランゼドーラ王国が 保障しよう。:
From here on, Al-Ahagiro's safety shall be
guaranteed by the Kingdom of Gran Zedora.

52399.「もう わかってるかもしれないけど\n ……私 もともとは 魔物なの。:
As you may have already guessed...
I was originally a monster.

52400.「この姿になる前は ある まもの使いに仕える\n ホイミスライムだったんだ……。:
Before I took this form, I was a Healslime in
the service of a certain Monster Master...

52401.「ねぇ <cs_pchero>さん。\n これから ムルードの岩山へ来てくれる？:
Do you think you can come to Murudo Mountain
later? I want to tell you everything.

52402.「あのレリーフの所で 待ってるね。: I'll be waiting at that monument.

52403.「あっ <pc>さん。\n 呼びつけちゃって ごめんね。:
Oh, <pc>. Sorry to call you
all the way out here.

52404.「私が 過去を取り戻せたのは\n <pc>さんの おかげだよ。:
It's thanks to you that I got my memories
back.

52405.「いろいろ助けてくれた あなたには\n ベルムドさんのこと 私が思いだしたこと…:
You've helped me in so many ways, and I want
you to know everything that I remember about
Bermud... everything.

52406.「ベルムドさんは 有名な まもの使いだったの。\n 昔 アラハギーロの格闘場の管:
Bermud was a famous Monster Master. He used
to manage Al-Ahagiro's arena and was
highly respected.

52407.「さっき 私が 人間の姿になる前は\n ある まもの使いに仕えていた\n ホイミ:
I told you earlier that before I took human
form, I was a Healslime in the service of a
certain Monster Master, right?

52408.「……このチョメこそ 私が仕えてた\n まもの使いの カレヴァンさんなの。:
Clawde is actually Kalevan, the Monster Master
who I once served.

52409.「ベルムドさんと カレヴァンさんは\n 若い頃から 同じ師匠のもとで修行を積んだ:
Bermud and Kalevan were like siblings
who had trained under the same master since
they were little.

52410.「驚いた……よね？ \n 人間と魔物が 入れ替わってるなんて……。\n なんで:
Surprising, isn't it...? How in the world did
monsters and humans switch places...?

52411.「きっと すべては あの戦争……\n 魔族の大軍隊との戦いが 原因ね。:
I'm sure it's because of that war against the
great demon army...

52412.「戦争が起こったとき この国の軍隊は\n ベルムドさんの魔物たちを 戦力……いえ:
When the war broke out, this country's army
sent out Bermud's monsters as their own
force... or rather, as fodder for the demons.

52413.「カレヴァンさんは 慕っていたベルムドさんに\n ずっと ついていくって決めてて:
Kalevan was determined to follow Bermud
wherever he went... so he also went to war.

52414.「そこで 何が起こったのか わからないけど\n 気がついたら 私は人間の姿で\n:
I'm not sure what happened after that, but the
next thing I knew I was a human, and Kalevan
was a Great Sabrecat...

52415.「あの戦争のせいで この国の歯車が\n 全部 くるっちゃったんだ……。:
Because of that war, all the people in this
country were transformed...

52416.「でも <pc>さん これだけは言わせて。\n ベルムドさんは 決して 悪い人じ:
But I want to say just one thing. Bermud was
not a bad person. He was a very kind man who
loved monsters very much.

52417.「魔物を…… 私たちを 思いやる心が\n ベルムドさんを あんなふうに\n 変え:
It was his compassion for monsters... for
us... that made him into the man he was...

52418.「あっ そうだ！\n <pc>さんを 呼びだしたのは\n もうひとつ 用事があっ:
Oh, that's right! I called you here
because there's one more thing I needed to
do!

52419.「<pc>さん。\n 蝶を探してるって 言ってたよね？:
You said you were looking for butterflies,
right?

52420.「これのことも さっき 一緒に思いだしたんだ。: I was just thinking about this earlier.

52421.「この腕輪ね こうやって ふたつ重ねると\n 蝶に見えるの。あなたの探してた蝶っ:
These bracelets have a butterfly shape when
they're put together... I thought this might
be one of the butterflies you're looking for.

52422.「私たちの 大事なものだけど……\n コレくらいしか お礼できるものがないから\:
These bracelets are precious to us, but...
This is the only thing we can give to you to
show our thanks!

52424.「私は これから カレヴァンさんと一緒に\n 旅に出ようかなって 思ってる。\n:
I'm thinking of going on a journey with
Kalevan. I wanna get out there and see the
world.

52425.「そうすれば なぜ アラハギーロが\n あんなことになったのか……\n 何か わ:
Maybe then I can get some idea of how
Al-Ahagiro got into this mess...

52426.「それじゃあ <pc>さん\n また どこかで会いましょ。\n ホントに ホント:
Well, it's been fun, <pc>! Maybe
we'll see each other again soon.
Thank you so, so much!

53282.「へー ドランゴさんの墓なのか。\n ……って 爆走竜ドランゴ！？\n まさか:
Hmm, Lizzie's tomb...? Roaring Dragon Lizzie?!
No way... I think Lizzie is a monster's name.

53283.「んん？ そのキラーパンサーは なんだ！？: Hmm? What's with that Great Sabrecat?

55377.「よしよし いい子ね。: There, there. That's a good boy.

55379.「あなたは この国の王様なんかじゃないでしょ！\n あなたはっ……: You are not the king of this land! You are...

55380.「もしかして あのオリにいた魔物たちは\n 一緒に 戦争へ向かった 兵士さん……:
Could it be that the monsters in the cells are
the soldiers who went to war...?

70488.「あ！ こんなことしてる場合じゃなかった！\n 急がなきゃ！:
Aah! I can't get distracted! Come on, let's
go!

74715.「一緒に戦争に向かった 格闘場の魔物たちは\n アラハギーロの民に。私たちを戦争:
The monsters we fought became Al-Ahagiro's
people, and the soldiers we sent to fight
became the arena's monsters.
